keyword: how many calories is in a sweet tea
title: How Many Calories Are in a Sweet Tea?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a sweet tea with this 8 oz serving breakdown, including carbs, sugars, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Sweet Tea?
assumptions: 8 oz (240 ml) glass of homemade southern-style sweet tea, brewed black tea sweetened with about 2 tbsp granulated sugar, chilled, no lemon or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sweetness level, tea strength, sugar type, brand (for bottled), and serving size. Check labels for commercial products.

quick_answer.text: A standard 8 oz serving of sweet tea contains about 86 calories, primarily from added sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a sweet tea per 8 oz?
faqs.a: About 86 calories for a standard sweetened serving.

faqs.q: Is sweet tea high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 22 g of sugars per 8 oz, all from added sweeteners.

faqs.q: How does bottled sweet tea compare?
faqs.a: Brands like Lipton may have 90-110 kcal per 8 oz, varying by recipe.

faqs.q: Can I make low-calorie sweet tea?
faqs.a: Use zero-calorie sweeteners like Splenda to drop calories to nearly 2 kcal per serving.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in sweet tea?
faqs.a: Around 22 g carbs per 8 oz, with 0 g fiber and all as sugars.
